header.description: No scalar header fields required for this report.

rows.description: Time-series readings from level transmitter sensors, one row per timestamp with 30 sensor columns.

totals.description: No totals required for this report.

semantics: All columns are direct pass-through from the database. No filter parameters are required. Optional time-range filtering can be applied via timestamp_utc.
transformations: No reshaping required â€” the source table is already in wide format matching the report structure.
Rows are ordered by timestamp_utc descending to show the most recent readings first.
